attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The PM should refer to my erudite report to John Reid re Unreliability (including sabotage) of backup generators.

The USA research facility, Plum Island, had a power cut followed by failure of all three emergency backup generators.  This led to failure of the ebola containment measures.  (Hilary Clinton became involved in demands for full inquiry).

Please ensure that this was not the situation concerning release of research Foot and Mouthj Virus at Pirbright.
